data.title: Driver Education and Training Courses Certified by the DMV
data.meta_description: The Official Nebraska Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) Government Website.
data.text:
The agencies listed below have been certified by the Department of Motor Vehicles to offer Driver Education and Training Courses required for:

Reinstatement of Point Revocation

Under Age 21 Six (6) Point Accumulation

Employment Driving Permit (completion required within 60 days of permit authorization)

Two (2) point credit to your driving record (within limited guidelines). To receive the two (2) point credit, the class must be completed on a voluntary basis - if the DMV is requiring the course for reinstatement or to prevent suspension for the Under Age 21 Point Accumulation, it will not be used for the point credit. This program can only be utilized once every five (5) years and the course must be completed prior to the date of violation that would assess the 12th point on the driving record.

NOTE: CDL / CLP holders are not eligible to take the STOP Class or the 2-Point Credit Class

Cornhusker Driving School

"Driver Improvement Course”
